messages.subject: Re: Rue Kreams' book
messages.msgSnippet: wanted to support kelly s plug for Rue s book. I just wrote a review of the book for the main Australian homeschool mag which you can read at:
messages.messageBody:
wanted to support kelly's plug for Rue's book. I just wrote a review
of the book for the main Australian homeschool mag which you can read
at:
http://theparentingpit.com/reviews/rue-kream ï¿½-parenting-a-free-child/

the review is pitched at homeschoolers who are "natural learners" but
still implement regulated/ control parenting, which is the main
tendency here in Australia (RU is still relatively small but growing).

Rue's book along with Joyce Fetteroll's web site at http://
www.joyfullyrejoycing.com/ are the two main resources (besides these
elists) that got us through our common freak outs particularly as we
unregulated food & tv.

Rue's book is slightly harder to get here so we ended up ordering
over a dozen copies for interested friends, homeschoolers and family.
I think people suspect that we get a commission on her book sales
because we have been plugging it so much ;)

cheers
arun

> Parenting A Free Child, An Unschooled Life by our very own Rue Kream.
> Rue's a moderator here at Unschooling Basics.
>
> Her website: http://freechild.info/
>
> A must have for anyone considering unschooling and/or gentle
parenting!

_____________________________________________

| anne + arun |
http://www.theparentingpit.com





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: mouser4@...

Where do I get the book that was mentioned in a post earlier that
was
written by Rue Kreams? Sorry, I'm in a bit of a hurry and I can't
remember the exact title. I did check for it earlier online and
couldn't find it and I also looked in the files section.

-=-=-=-=-=-

Parenting A Free Child, An Unschooled Life by our very own Rue Kream.
Rue's a moderator here at Unschooling Basics.

Her website: http://freechild.info/

A must have for anyone considering unschooling and/or gentle parenting!

~Kelly



Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://www.LiveandLearnConference.org
